title: when to hit start on the FC without ssh

content.raw:
Using ssh we can monitor the docker image building in the FC and see when it is done and ready for us to hit "start" in cloudsim.  Without an ssh connection, we cannot tell when the docker image has finished building and whether the build was successful (currently it works about 3 out of 4 times, no change in the repo, seems to fail after the very last intermediate image finishes).  When it fails, I build the image manually from the ssh connection.

Assuming it does build, how do we know when the build is finished and it is OK to hit "start' on the FC in cloudsim?
